subtitle: This is a deliciously simple recipe that?s perfect for a supper dish.

method.text: Drain and chop the canned tomatoes. Place in a pan with the garlic, mushrooms and wine.
Bring to boil, cover and simmer for 30 min. Add cream and return to boil.
Simmer for about 10 min until thickened. Season. Put the ham into individual gratin dishes and spoon the tomato mixture over.
Grate the cheese, mix with the breadcrumbs and use to top the ham and tomato. Bake for 20 min. Serve hot.

title: Ham gratin
